Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the images have been doctored from original photos in which the two presidents were not holding any objects.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on doctored images and not on actual evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photos show the two presidents holding 'light sticks' for a Korean boyband, without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the photos have been manipulated and do not depict the actual situation of the two presidents holding any objects.
